name: Space Angels
overview:
Space Angels Network is the premier source of aerospace dealflow for investors and of early-stage capital for aerospace-related ventures across a wide spectrum of technologies, markets, and industries. They are a professionally managed national network of accredited investors focused on aerospace-related opportunities.

Space Angels members are accredited investors who share a common passion for promoting the development of aerospace-related industries and technologies while also making a solid return on private investments.

Space Angels Network values the privacy of their members and entrepreneurs. Any information provided via their application processes will be kept confidential to be used only for the purposes of screening applicants and will not be provided to anyone else for any other purpose. Also, they understand that information provided by entrepreneurs during the investment process may include sensitive competitive details, and as such their technology platform, and their staff, Advisors, and members all aspire to the highest levels of confidentiality.
